resources.string:
• A user friendly tool to keep track of your cable network
• Get a bird’eye view of your current network realm
• Get a overall status of network from the dashboard
• Analyse the path and signal strength of individual fibers

We are two senior collage students that major in « Networks and Telecommunications » . We developped this app as part of our senior project (PFE) . This has been supervised by S.O.T.E.T.E.L where our intership took place
